<Extension()> Public Function GetFicTokenAsync (tokenAcquirer As ITokenAcquirer, Optional options As AcquireTokenOptions = Nothing, Optional clientAssertion As String = Nothing, Optional scope As String = "api://AzureAdTokenExchange/.default", Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of AcquireTokenResult)

static member GetFicTokenAsync : Microsoft.Identity.Abstractions.ITokenAcquirer * Microsoft.Identity.Abstractions.AcquireTokenOptions * string * string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Identity.Abstractions.AcquireTokenResult>

Docs.param: Token acquirer from which to get a Federation Identity Credential token. A FIC token is used as a client assertion to get another token.
Options for the token acquisition (for instance to override the tenant programmatically).
Client assertion to use for the token acquisition. If null, the FIC Token will be acquired using the credentials associated with token token acquirer (that is the named from the )
Docs.summary: Used to exchange a client assertion for a token.
